DOC.brief_summary: Despite widespread use hip knee replacement surgery , considerable lack consensus regard postoperative treatment rehabilitation , mostly lack well-designed study test efficacy effectiveness practice . In particular recommendation regard use ergometer cycle hip knee replacement surgery . Therefore investigator initiate multicenter control clinical trial evaluate effect ergometer cycle versus ergometer cycle hip knee replacement surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Ergometer Cycling After Replacement Hip Knee Joint
